Module kivakit.core.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.locales

Class Locale

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.locales.Locale
  • public class Locale
extends java.lang.Object
    A locale constructed from a LanguageIsoCode and an optional CountryIsoCode. Provides a unique path to localized resources for this locale with path().
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)

        public CountryIsoCode country()
        Returns:
        Any country for this locale, or null if the locale is relevant to the whole world

      • path

        public StringPath path()
        Produces a path of the form "locales/[language-name](/[country-name])?. This path can be used when loading localizable resources.
        Returns:
        A relative path of the given type for this locale
